Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.2.0-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.2.0-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 1.2.0-9, affected by CVE-2023-48795
